docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Jan. 16 -- The city of San Juan, capital of the Andes Mountain Province of the same name, suffered catastrophic damage in an earthquake that struck most sharply for a period of fifty seconds at 8:48 o'clock last night.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Jan. 16 -- The city of San Juan, capital of the Andes Mountain Province of the same name, suffered catastrophic damage in an earthquake that struck most sharply for a period of fifty seconds at 8:48 o'clock last night.
docs.abstract: new quakes; 500 dead and many injured; most of San Juan devastated; relief organized; govt officials and drs fly to area; history of San Juan; map

headline.main: Argentine Quake Dead Reach 500; San Juan in Andes Is Devastated; ARGENTINE EARTHQUAKE THAT KILLED HUNDREDS
FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED JAN. 15, 1944

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 19 (AP) -- Authorized spokesmen said today information exchanged between eighteen American republics had shown that Bolivian revolutionary leaders were in contact with Argentine nationalists in the home of Count Karl von...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 19 (AP) -- Authorized spokesmen said today information exchanged between eighteen American republics had shown that Bolivian revolutionary leaders were in contact with Argentine nationalists in the home of Count Karl von Luxburg, former German Minister to Buenos Aires, before the Dec. 20 coup in La Paz.
docs.abstract: Bolivian coup leaders contact with Argentine nationalists in Count K von Luxburg home reptd in data exchd by 18 nations

headline.main: JOINT TALKS BARE BOLIVIA-AXIS LINK; Montevideo Says Coup Leaders Met Argentine Nationalists in Reich Ex-Envoy's Home

docs.abstract: Montevideo Razon publishes purported photo of lr signed by Ger Buenos Aires embassy sec R Weilhermer (Weilharter) and addressed to R Kellman with instructions from Ger Charge d'Affaires in Argentine E O Meynen to order all Ger agents in S Amer to break up Pan-Amer bloc; personal message from Hitler cited

headline.main: Front Page 1 -- No Title; ARGENTINE SEIZED IN TRINIDAD AS SPY

docs.snippet: J.F. Vallet has been named representative of the American Brake Shoe Company for Argentina, Chile, Paraguay and Uruguay, with headquarters in Buenos Aires.
docs.lead_paragraph: J.F. Vallet has been named representative of the American Brake Shoe Company for Argentina, Chile, Paraguay and Uruguay, with headquarters in Buenos Aires.

docs.snippet: There should be only one seamen's union in this country, not three or four whose jurisdictions are figured out by geography -- the American Merchant Marine means just what it says, not a Gulf merchant marine, or Atlantic merchant marine, or Pacific...
docs.lead_paragraph: There should be only one seamen's union in this country, not three or four whose jurisdictions are figured out by geography -- the American Merchant Marine means just what it says, not a Gulf merchant marine, or Atlantic merchant marine, or Pacific merchant marine, Rear Admiral Emory S. Land, War Shipping Administrator, declared last week before a national council meeting of the National Maritime Union.
docs.abstract: Rear Adm Land not optimistic on US raising other nations standards

headline.main: EVENTS OF INTEREST IN SHIPPING WORLD; Admiral Land Urges Only One Seamen's Union -- Praises Record of NMU

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 22 (AP) -- Uruguay and Cuba announced today they would not recognize the month-old revolutionary regime in Bolivia, topping off a series of widely separated developments in connection with allegations of Nazi activities in...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 22 (AP) -- Uruguay and Cuba announced today they would not recognize the month-old revolutionary regime in Bolivia, topping off a series of widely separated developments in connection with allegations of Nazi activities in South America.
docs.abstract: Refuses to recognize new Bolivian regime

headline.main: URUGUAY AND CUBA BAN BOLIVIA REGIME; Refuse Recognition to New Government on Ground of Outside Influence
